message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper proposes a strategy to simplify two typical hierarchical recurrent models, which are commonly used in natural language processing tasks such as machine translation and question answering. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also focuses on improving the training efficiency without compromising performance, which suggests that it may also belong to categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The proposed method involves using a simplified variant of GRU and an efficient encoding method, which are related to neural networks and deep learning, indicating that it may also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition).
